data.name: Hentai VR
data.detailed_description:
This VR game allows you to have sex with a beautiful woman with large breasts in a space where the two of you are together alone.
You can touch her all over her body, grab her, and move her around.
Since she does not become reluctant no matter what you do, choose any position or type of foreplay.
You can even grab her hands and pump so hard that her knees give way.


Explanation of the game:
You can use your hands to grab and move her face, arms, breasts, and butt.
When you play with her using your hands, penis, or an adult toy, she responds in a sexy way.
It is very immersive, and you can even enjoy the feel of point-of-view pornography using the video.


Controls:
You have a high degree of freedom, as you can move around the VR space freely, and 6dof is supported.
You can change outfits and situations by touching the cube.


Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
